FileFormat.FormatDescription: SubRip subtitle files contain formatted lines of plain text in groups separated by a blank line. Subtitles are numbered sequentially, starting at 1. The timecode format used is hours:minutes:seconds,milliseconds, with time units fixed to two zero-padded digits and fractions fixed to three zero-padded digits, e.g. '00:00:00,000'.

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: Absolute from beginning of file, offset 0-64: xx:xx:xx,xxxxxx --> xx:xx:xx,xxx where each x is a numeric value 0-9
